Words by:

Taylor Rouleau

Currently a Project Manager at Sama, Taylor Rouleau has a passion for ensuring ethical and sustainable practices in tech. After 5 years leading production teams for our customers, Taylor's expertise is applied internally in our Project Management Office. She heads up efforts to maintain our industry-leading data training processes with a special focus on Security & Compliance.
